mapper.select: select banner_code bannerCode, image_url imageUrl, sort_no sortNo, sku_no skuNo from t_sys_picture where is_deleted = 0 order by sort_no ASC

select dict_value
from t_dicitonary
where dict_name = "displayCnt" and is_deleted = 0

select b.hotgoods_code hotGoodsCode, b.sort_no sort_no, b.sku_no skuNo, a.picture_url pictureUrl, a.sku_name skuName, a.selling_price from t_sys_goods a, t_sys_hotgoods b where a.sku_no = b.sku_no and b.is_deleted = 0 order by b.sort_no ASC limit 0,#{displayCnt}
